NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Chairman — TV Board
Seattle, Washington
January 2$, l?6l
William Harley, Pres.
NAEB
Washington, D. C.
Dear Bills
As a matter of reporting on the progress of the
wage survey of e ducational television stations —
the survey is progressing, altho somewhat bogged
down in the slowness of returns from stations.
Loren B. Stone
